item.title: 中国建筑商光芒集团在销售下滑之际违约发行美元债券
item.description: 中国开发商光芒控股集团有限公司（Radiance Holdings Group Co.【原文：Chinese developer Radiance Holdings Group Co. defaulted on a $300 million bond after it missed a payment due Wednesday, making it the latest company in the nation’s real estate sector to fail to meet its repayment obligations.】

item.title: 摩根大通考虑在改组中任命新的中国区主管
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根大通公司正在考虑任命其亚太区首席财务官和香港的一位重要交易员来管理其中国业务。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is considering appointing its Asia-Pacific chief financial officer and a key Hong Kong dealmaker to run its China business, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Olam 对澳大利亚棉花加工商 Namoi 的报价高于 Dreyfus 的报价
item.description: 随着全球最大的两家农产品贸易商争相收购澳大利亚最大的棉花加工商，奥兰集团有限公司（Olam Group Ltd.）也加入了对 Namoi 棉花有限公司的争夺。【原文：Olam Group Ltd. has entered the race for Namoi Cotton Ltd. as two of the world’s biggest agricultural traders jostle to buy Australia’s largest processor of the commodity.】

item.title: 基金因财政担忧和免费午餐承诺抛售印尼债券
item.description: 由于选举承诺引发了对预算的担忧和可能出现的支出狂潮，国际投资者对印尼债券变得畏首畏尾。【原文：International investors have become skittish over Indonesian bonds as election pledges have spurred burgeoning budgetary fears and a possible spending spree.】

item.title: 美国为澳大利亚稀土项目提供 6 亿美元贷款
item.description: 一家美国支持的贷款机构向一家澳大利亚矿商提供了 6 亿美元贷款，用于开发一个稀土项目，这是将关键矿产供应链扩展到中国以外地区的最新举措。【原文：A US-backed lender has offered an Australian miner $600 million in loans to develop a rare earths project, the latest move to expand the critical minerals supply chain outside of China.】

item.title: 投资者评估日本和美国利率前景，日元走高
item.description: 由于投资者权衡日本和美国的利率前景，日元八天来首次走强。【原文：The yen strengthened for the first time in eight days as investors weighed the outlook for interest rates in Japan and the US.】

item.title: 日元走软推动出口企业发展，日本股市必将上涨
item.description: 日本央行的政策决定加速了日元的跌势，而美联储的政策决定则让投资者感到宽慰，因此日本股市在公共假期结束重新开市后将会上涨。【原文：Japanese stocks are set to rise when markets reopen from a public holiday after the Bank of Japan’s policy decision accelerated the yen’s drop, while the Federal Reserve provided a sense of relief for investors.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储在维持基准稳定的同时，也给了投资者对减产前景的信心。做空机构兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）有了新目标。美国政府将向英特尔公司提供数十亿美元，用于提高芯片产量。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. The Federal Reserve gave investors confidence in the prospects for cuts even as it held its benchmark steady. Short seller Hindenburg Research has a new target. And the US government is giving Intel billions to boost chip production. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 用数十亿美元铸成大错的投资者又开始小赢一把了
item.description: 麦格理亚洲阿尔法基金（Macquarie Asian Alpha Fund）是该地区量化对冲基金的先驱，高峰期规模达 20 亿美元，在关闭该基金五年后，资深基金经理尼克-伯德（Nick Bird）又回来了。【原文：Five years after shutting down Macquarie Asian Alpha Fund, a pioneer of quantitative hedge funds in the region with $2 billion at its peak, veteran fund manager Nick Bird is back.】

item.title: 石油走高，美国库存减少，美联储降息成焦点
item.description: 在美国库存下降、美联储发出今年将降息的信号后，石油价格攀升，从而提振了更广泛市场的风险偏好，并打击了美元。【原文：Oil climbed after US stockpiles fell, and the Federal Reserve signaled that interest rates would be cut this year, boosting risk appetite across wider markets and bruising the dollar.】

item.title: 交易员从美联储那里获得 "金锁 "前景，推动市场上涨
item.description: 交易员们已经做好了准备，期待杰罗姆-鲍威尔对他们的降息希望作出反击；当他没有这样做时，华尔街上闪现出买入信号。【原文：Traders were prepared for Jerome Powell to push back on their interest-rate-cut hopes — and when he didn’t, buy signals flashed across Wall Street.】

item.title: 亚洲股市受美联储影响上涨，黄金创历史新高：市场综述
item.description: 由于美联储表示今年将进行三次降息以满足市场预期，美国股市触及新高，亚洲股市周四开始反弹。黄金价格首次突破每盎司 2,200 美元。【原文：Asian equities were primed to rally Thursday after US stocks touched fresh highs as the Federal Reserve indicated it would meet market expectations with three rate cuts this year. Gold topped $2,200 an ounce for the first time.】

item.title: 调查显示：即使美联储发出降息信号，股市也将失去动力
item.description:
据彭博社在美联储3月会议后进行的民意调查显示，S&P 500指数的涨幅将在年底前放缓，而债券尚未触底

。【原文：

Gains in the S&P 500 will slow by year-end while bonds have yet to hit bottom, according to a Bloomberg poll following the Federal Reserve’s March meeting

】

item.title: 现货黄金首次升至每盎司 2,200 美元
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，"在今年的某个时间点 "开始宽松政策是合适的，在美联储维持今年三次降息四分之一点的前景后，黄金价格首次突破每盎司2,200美元。【原文：Gold topped $2,200 an ounce for the first time after the Federal Reserve maintained its outlook for three quarter-point rate cuts this year, with Chair Jerome Powell saying it’s appropriate to start easing “at some point this year.”】

item.title: Trial Holdings 将在日本今年最大的首次公开募股后首次亮相
item.description: 折扣连锁店运营商 Trial Holdings Inc. 首次公开募股募集了 388.5 亿日元（2.56 亿美元）资金，将于周四在东京上市，这是日本今年最大的一次公开募股。【原文：Discount-store chain operator Trial Holdings Inc. is set to debut in Tokyo on Thursday after an initial public offering that raised ¥38.85 billion ($256 million), Japan’s largest this year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚煤矿企业寻求私人资本，银行对此心存疑虑
item.description: 澳大利亚煤炭生产商越来越多地涉足高息私人贷款，因为贷款人希望取代因环境、社会和公司治理问题而不情愿的银行。【原文：Australian coal producers are increasingly dabbling in high-interest private loans as lenders look to replace reluctant banks that are held back by ESG concerns.】

item.title: 乳制品出口商恒天然提高上半年股息，利润率增长带动利润增长
item.description: 全球最大的乳制品出口商恒天然合作社集团（Fonterra Cooperative Group）因利润率提高而增加了上半年的股息。【原文：Fonterra Cooperative Group, the world’s largest dairy exporter, increased its first-half dividend after improving margins boosted its earnings.】

item.title: 以太坊基金会在最新加密货币打击行动中接受美国证券交易委员会审查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国证券交易委员会已要求各公司提供与以太坊基金会交易的相关信息，作为对全球第二大加密货币以太坊的审查工作的一部分。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission has demanded information from companies about dealings with the Ethereum Foundation as part of a review of aspects of Ether — the world’s second-biggest cryptocurrency, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 监视特别节目：鲍威尔只说不答
item.description:
埃尔-埃里安听到了美联储容忍通胀上升的信号，市场也听到了

。【原文：

El-Erian hears a signal of Fed tolerance for higher inflation, and so does the market

】

item.title: 人工智能机遇助推美光收入预测飙升
item.description: 美国最大的计算机内存芯片制造商美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc.【原文：Micron Technology Inc., the largest US maker of computer memory chips, jumped in late trading after giving a strong revenue forecast for the current quarter, buoyed by demand for artificial intelligence hardware.】

item.title: 据说 TPG 正在洽谈收购加拿大房地产投资信托基金（Canada REIT）的活动房屋部门
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 TPG Inc. 正在洽谈收购加拿大公寓物业房地产投资信托基金（Canadian Apartment Properties REIT）的工业化住宅业务，这是美国一家大型投资者涉足其北方邻国历来紧俏的房地产市场的举措。【原文：Alternative asset manager TPG Inc. is in talks to buy the manufactured housing business of Canadian Apartment Properties REIT, a move by a major US investor to gain exposure to the historically tight real estate market of its northern neighbor.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡将于下周开始与投资者进行重组谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，全球投资者和斯里兰卡官员预计将于下周开始谈判，以重组 120 亿美元的全球违约债券。【原文：Global investors and Sri Lanka officials expect to start negotiations aimed at restructuring $12 billion in defaulted global bonds next week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 赤字增加，加拿大各省今年借款将增加 22
item.description: 据加拿大国家银行金融市场部门称，加拿大各省为弥补预算缺口，将发行比去年更多的债务。【原文：Canadian provinces are set to issue more debt than they did last year as they look to plug budget shortfalls, according to National Bank of Canada’s financial markets unit.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司提升液化天然气进口量以抵消主要管道维修费用
item.description: 巴西国有控股石油公司 Petrobras 本月将转向液化天然气进口，以确保在对一条主要近海管道进行维护工作期间的供应。【原文：Brazilian state-controlled oil company Petrobras is turning to liquefied natural gas imports this month to secure supplies while it carries out maintenance work at a major offshore pipeline.】

item.title: 油砂生产商将于本周申请碳捕集许可
item.description: 据领导该进程的一位高管透露，一批大型油砂生产商将于本周向加拿大能源监管机构提交价值 120 亿美元的碳捕集项目申请，以期在明年做出最终投资决定。【原文：A group of major oil-sands producers will submit applications for a $12 billion carbon capture project to Canada’s energy regulator this week with an aim of making a final investment decision next year, according to an executive leading the process.】

item.title: 在米莱伊的休克疗法启动之前，阿根廷第四季度经济就已下滑
item.description: 阿根廷经济在第四季度出现萎缩，巩固了全年的负增长，甚至在即将上任的总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）将削减开支作为其休克疗法的一部分之前也是如此。【原文：Argentina’s economy shrank in the fourth quarter, consolidating a full year of negative growth, even before incoming President Javier Milei slashed spending as part of his shock therapy.】

item.title: 阿根廷油田亿万富翁对米莱伊充满 "希望
item.description: 石油管道制造商特纳里斯公司（Tenaris SA）的亿万富豪总裁保罗-罗卡（Paolo Rocca）说，人们对阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）能够加快该国页岩矿藏的开发寄予厚望。【原文：Paolo Rocca, billionaire chief of oil-pipe maker Tenaris SA, said expectations are high that Argentina’s President Javier Milei can turbo-charge development of the country’s shale deposits.】

item.title: 特鲁多大型输油管道的启动日期取决于最后 1.6 英里的路程
item.description: 随着跨山公司（Trans Mountain）在不列颠哥伦比亚省崎岖不平的弗雷泽河谷（Fraser Valley）的坚硬岩石中钻探出 715 英里管道的最后一段，加拿大大型石油管道的启动日期将在几周内揭晓。【原文：The startup date for Canada’s mega oil pipeline should be known within weeks as Trans Mountain drills through hard rock in British Columbia’s rugged Fraser Valley for the final stretch of the 715-mile conduit.】

item.title: 美联储将保持当前缩减资产负债表的节奏
item.description: 即使过剩的流动性继续从金融体系中流失，美联储仍将保持减持债券的步伐。【原文：The Federal Reserve will maintain the pace at which it’s reducing bond holdings, even as excess liquidity continues to drain from the financial system.】

item.title: 美联储将 2024 年利率中值预测维持在 3 次下调后债券反弹
item.description: 美联储政策制定者在修订利率预测后继续预计年底前将降息三个季度，同时预计未来几年的利率将高于 12 月份的水平，国债收益率随之下降。【原文：Treasury yields declined after Federal Reserve policy makers’ revised interest-rate forecasts continued to anticipate three quarter-point cuts by year-end, while projecting higher rates in future years than they saw in December.】
